definition[0]: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine
definition[1]: the row of keys on some musical instruments that you press in order to play them
definition[2]: an electronic musical instrument similar to a piano that can make sounds like many different instruments
example[1]: Chris Kelly (guitar) and Benny Hayes (keyboards and vocals)
definition[3]: to put information into a computer, using a keyboard
definition[4]: a board with buttons marked with different letters and numbers which are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine
example[2]: the F2 key on your computer keyboard
example[3]: The best way would be to keyboard the entries into the correct places in the document.
